name: OptiQly
description: Beta: OptiQly looks at key factors to assess and score the marketing and merchandising potential of a book and author.
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://www.google-analytics.com https://apis.google.com https://www.gstatic.com https://ip-api.com https://js-agent.newrelic.com https://bam.nr-data.net https://ly-oq-extension.firebaseio.com https://s-usc1c-nss-114.firebaseio.com 'unsafe-eval'; object-src 'self'
